title: Metrics & Analytics
description: Event tracking, variant tagging, and analytics dashboard

requirements.title: Event variant tagging
requirements.description: All events (page view, scroll, clicks, forms, conversions) include variant_id in payload
requirements.notes: Event schema: {event_type, variant_id, variant_slug, timestamp, session_id, ...}

requirements.title: Analytics variant filtering
requirements.description: Admin analytics view filters stats by variant and time range
requirements.notes: UI: dropdown for variant selection, date range picker (today, 7d, 30d, custom)

requirements.title: Minimum event coverage
requirements.description: System emits events for: page_view, scroll_depth (bands), click (element ID), form_submit, conversion (Stripe success)
requirements.notes: Scroll depth bands: 25%, 50%, 75%, 100%; Click: element ID or data-track-id

requirements.title: Metrics idempotency
requirements.description: Metrics ingestion is idempotent or deduplicated to avoid double-counting on retries
requirements.notes: Use unique event_id or (session_id + event_type + timestamp) composite key

requirements.title: Analytics summary
requirements.description: Analytics home shows total visitors, conversion rate per variant, top CTAs by CTR
requirements.notes: Summary cards: Total Visitors, Conversion Rate, Top CTA (by click-through rate)

requirements.title: Variant detail view
requirements.description: Variant detail page shows views, CTA clicks, conversions, conversion rate, basic trend
requirements.notes: Detail view: line chart (7d trend), KPI cards (views, clicks, conversions, rate)
